page.title: 02ADLINGTON PEOPLE
page.content:
Class 7 of Anderton Primary School considered the famous people of their village, Adlington. Two famous people who used to live in Adlington are Bill Beaumont who captained England at rugby union and Paul Mariner who plays soccer for Arsenal and England.
Such sportsmen are the more famous products of a flourishing social and cultural life in this Lancashire village. For young people there are two church youth clubs, two Morris-dancing teams of competitive standard and Guide and Scout troops. There is a Church Boys' and Girls' Brigade and the Jay-Em School of Dancing. Young people also play a part in the St.John's Ambulance Brigade.
For those interested in sport we have bowling clubs, football clubs,
